candidates.title: Fix the pong example's scoreboard
candidates.body:
This brings back the pong scoreboard.
I also fixed the rendering problems with larger score, and capped them at 999 to avoid overlapping.

candidates.title: Upgrade fluent

labels.name: type: improvement
labels.description: An improvement or change to an existing feature.

candidates.body:
Fixes #1039 

~~This can't be merged until https://github.com/projectfluent/fluent-rs/pull/70 is merged and released to crates.~~ Blimy that was fast.  Ok should be good to merge now.

candidates.title: Added "saveload" feature to amethyst
candidates.body:
The feature "saveload" enables users to use `specs/saveload` module to serialize and deserialize entities and components. 

I'll only update the changelog if the time for merging comes, to avoid conflicts

candidates.title: [Feature] Hidden component and System

labels.name: type: feature
labels.description: A request for a new feature.

candidates.body:
A simple `Hidden` component that allows hiding an entity,
and a `HideHierarchySystem` (based on `UiTransformSystem`)  that propagates the `Hidden` changes through all children.

candidates.title: feat: Enable users to control what events get pushed to the states

labels.name: type: improvement
labels.description: An improvement or change to an existing feature.

candidates.body: Adds EventReader, which is a trait that abstract event reading. The primary user for this is to make it configurable what events get read by Application and sent to the States. Also added a new derive crate, which a derive macro for creating an EventReader for an aggregated event enum. This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/amethyst/amethyst/996)

candidates.title: Bumped dependency versions.

labels.name: type: improvement
labels.description: An improvement or change to an existing feature.

candidates.body:
```
ron             0.2   -> 0.4
shred           0.5   -> 0.7
bincode         0.9   -> 1.0
uuid            0.5.1 -> 0.7.1
thread_profiler 0.1   -> 0.3
image           0.19  -> 0.20
clipboard       0.4   -> 0.5
```

Tried bumping `fluent` from `0.2 -> 0.4`, but `MessageContext -> FluentBundle` is no longer `Send + Sync`, so I kept it as it is.

Hopefully this speeds up compilation times re:building multiple versions of dependencies.

candidates.title: Base Networking implementation

labels.name: type: feature
labels.description: A request for a new feature.

candidates.body:
This PR is in reference to #335. This PR originates from #665 and #532, this also stems from @jojolepro work in both those PRs.

This provides an initial implementation for networking just presenting the most basic way of communicating to a server and client that can be integrated into an amethyst application. In its current state, the only working example is `net_server` and `net_client`. When run at the same time, they send messages back and forth. There is also some commented code, mainly in the components folder of the `amethyst_network` crate due to not fitting the scope of the base implementation, but will be worked on after this PR is merged.

Opening this for inital review and comments.

Once, we agree this is good to go, I will add the changelog entry and squash.
